title: Fragment, 10th–12th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: plain cloth embroidered and appliquéd
description: Cream-colored linen plain cloth ground with light tan appliqué of linen plain cloth in design of rings enclosing circles within a lozenge shape. Broad border of lozenges enclosing quatrefoils. Triangular fragment.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 10th–12th century. Medium: linen
Technique: plain cloth embroidered and appliquéd. 1939-11-16.
